data.eml:eml: New taxa and data for Neotropical Phalangopsidae (Orthoptera, Grylloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Desutter-Grandcolas, Laure (2014): New taxa and data for Neotropical Phalangopsidae (Orthoptera, Grylloidea). Zootaxa 3866 (3): 398-420, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3866.3.5
